item.title: Portal Problum
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok so i made a new frost dragon portal but once u get the requirements you dont tele their

Hes the code

case 10: if((c.playerLevel[1] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[2] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[3] < 99)) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 att/def/str/pray to face the Frost Dragons"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[1] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[2] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[3] < 99)) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 att/def/str/pray to face the Frost Dragons"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[1] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[2] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[3] < 99)) { c.sendMessage("You need 99 att/def/str/pray to face the Frost Dragons"); } else { if((c.playerLevel[1] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[2] < 99) && (c.playerLevel[3] < 99)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(3052, 9577, 0); c.sendMessage("A nervous chill runs down your spine.."); c.sendMessage("you find yourself in the Frost Dragons Lair!"); } } } }
